I just logged in to comment that this game is in fact the most retarded game in existence, and it pains me to see those poor retarded children with downs obsessing over such a piece of shit of a game. Riot still doesnt have a fucking blue how many people's lives this game fucked over, and in the end we will all come to realize how much valuable time we wasted on this load of trash, and we will all regret every game we ever played.
